DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to compare the short-term effects on growth and feeding tolerance of a liquid high calorie formula added to human milk versus powdered human milk fortifier in small preterm infants.
DOC.brief_title: Liquid Preterm Formula Versus Powdered Human Milk Fortifier in VLBW Infants
DOC.criteria: Infants between 500 and 1499 grams of birthweight, receiving mother's milk. Infants with major congenital anomalies and previous history of gastrointestinal disease.
